attractions.name: Marco Zero Square
attractions.description: The historic starting point of the city, offering stunning waterfront views and a vibrant atmosphere.

attractions.name: Rua do Bom Jesus
attractions.address: Rua do Bom Jesus, Recife Antigo
attractions.description: Voted one of the most beautiful streets in the world, famous for its colorful colonial architecture.

attractions.name: Instituto Ricardo Brennand
attractions.description: A cultural institute featuring a stunning collection of art, armor, and a beautiful castle-like structure.

attractions.name: Oficina Cerâmica Francisco Brennand
attractions.description: A unique ceramic workshop and open-air museum created by the visionary artist Francisco Brennand.

attractions.name: Paço do Frevo
attractions.address: Praça do Arsenal da Marinha, Recife Antigo
attractions.description: A cultural center dedicated to celebrating and preserving Frevo, Pernambuco's iconic music and dance.

attractions.name: Boa Viagem Beach
attractions.description: Recife's main urban beach, protected by a line of reefs that form natural swimming pools at low tide.

attractions.name: Catamaran Tours
attractions.address: Cais das Cinco Pontas, São José
attractions.description: Explore Recife's rivers and bridges, the 'Brazilian Venice', with a relaxing and informative boat tour.

attractions.name: Mercado de São José
attractions.description: A historic iron market from the 19th century offering a wide variety of local crafts, foods, and herbs.
